menu.name: Irida Options
menu.desc: Options that are unique to 'Jeffy's Infinite Irida'.

menu.name: Shaders
menu.desc: Toggle on or off every shader! (Disable EVERY shader in 'Appearence > Advanced > Gameplay Shaders')

checkbox.name: FPS Counter
checkbox.desc: Toggles the framerate and memory counter in the top-left. (You can also press 'F3')

checkbox.name: Cutscenes
checkbox.desc: Toggles video cutscenes that play before or after a song.

checkbox.name: Time Left Text
checkbox.desc: Toggles the text showing how long of the song is left in between the strums.

checkbox.name: Rating Graphics
checkbox.desc: Toggles the ratings which appear on the HUD whenever a note is pressed.
